iox.google.authenticate¶

iox.google.authenticate(endpoint, credentials='credentials.json')[source]¶

Authenticate Google

Parameters

  • endpoint (str) – Google scope to authenticate

  • credentials (str) – Google credentials

Returns

Authenticated credentials

Return type

google.oauth2.credentials.Credentials
